plot: When a person experiences a loss, it is sad but can also be celebrated. Whether it's a film or a person, they are forever honoured and remembered by the mark they make on the world.
title: 100 Mountains
plot_es: When a person experiences a loss, it is sad but can also be celebrated. Whether it's a film or a person, they are forever honoured and remembered by the mark they make on the world.
plot_en: When a person experiences a loss, it is sad but can also be celebrated. Whether it's a film or a person, they are forever honoured and remembered by the mark they make on the world.
